mapper.insert: INSERT INTO OPENDATACOLLECT(NAME, PROVIDER, URL, EP, TIME, STATUS, COMMENT, KEYS) VALUES(#{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{provider, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ep, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{time, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status, jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, #{comment, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{keys, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) /* INSERT INTO OPENDATACOLLECT(NAME, PROVIDER, URL, EP, TIME, STATUS, COMMENT, KEYS) VALUES('#{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}', '#{provider, jdbcType=VARCHAR}', '#{url, jdbcType=VARCHAR}', '#{ep, jdbcType=VARCHAR}', '#{time, jdbcType=INTEGER}', '#{status, jdbcType=BOOLEAN}', '#{comment, jdbcType=VARCHAR}', '#{keys, jdbcType=VARCHAR}')*/
